meanings.definition: Dobsonflies: large aquatic insects with long antennae and prominent mandibles
meanings.sent1: The dobsonflies swam gracefully in the pond.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of dobsonflies near the river.
meanings.sent3: Why did the dobsonflies bring tiny umbrellas to the water?
meanings.sent4: The dobsonflies' mandibles were as sharp as tiny knives.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the dobsonflies' long antennae was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Dobsonflies: a group of insects in the family Corydalidae
meanings.sent1: Look at the dobsonflies flying together in the sky.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of dobsonflies in their research.
meanings.sent3: The dobsonflies held a family reunion on the tree branch.
meanings.sent4: The dobsonflies' group movement was like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: The chirping of the dobsonflies filled the forest with music.

meanings.definition: Dobsonflies: insects known for their distinctive appearance and behavior
meanings.sent1: Children love to watch the dobsonflies crawl on leaves.
meanings.sent2: The dobsonflies' unique features make them easy to identify.
meanings.sent3: Why did the dobsonflies wear tiny top hats on their heads?
meanings.sent4: The dobsonflies' behavior was as unpredictable as the weather.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the dobsonflies made them stand out in the forest.
